message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. This seems fair since the value of the money decreases faster for you.
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to take slightly less than your initial offer, but I'd like to see a more even split. Let's find a compromise!
Bob, I understand you want a more even split, but time is money!  Let's settle this now. I'll take a little less than my initial offer, you get a bit more than your proposal. Deal?
